text: Arau yadi tomara pitr-matrye tomaka mora lagata sbirka karaibalai hemca diye yi bisaye tomara kono jnana na'i, tente tumi sihamtara katha namaniba arau prthiraita sihamtara lagata basabasa karaiba sadbharae. Tumi tara patha aralambana karaa yiye mora abhimukhi haiche. Tara pichata tomalokara pratyarartana mora ocarate'i, tetiya ma'i tomalokaka se'i bisaye arahita karaima yibora tomaloke karaichila
